DOC.brief_summary: Stress Management intervention show decrease cancer-related distress , foster emotional growth improve immune functioning treatment breast cancer . This study evaluate online version stress management intervention woman early stage breast cancer . Each chapter 10-week intervention include self-assessment targeted feedback , education , interactive learning exercise -- tailor needs woman early stage breast cancer . In addition , guide writing exercise promote emotional expression discussion board encourage group support . The web-based intervention evaluate randomized clinical trial sample 120 woman early stage breast cancer . Women randomly assign use 10-week intervention biweekly telephone assessment telephone assessment alone .
DOC.brief_title: Online Stress Management Coping Skills Training Women With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Stress Management intervention show decrease cancer-related distress , foster emotional growth improve immune functioning treatment breast cancer . This study evaluate online version stress management intervention woman early stage breast cancer . Each chapter 10-week intervention include self-assessment targeted feedback , education , interactive learning exercise -- tailor needs woman early stage breast cancer . In addition , guide writing exercise promote emotional expression discussion board encourage group support . The web-based intervention evaluate randomized clinical trial sample 120 woman early stage breast cancer . Women randomly assign use 10-week intervention biweekly telephone assessment telephone assessment alone .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis stage 0 , I , II III breast cancer within past 18 month Elevated stress , distress negative mood Access least 1.5 2 hour per week computer audio capability connect internet Ability read , write , speak English sixth grade level Access telephone active email account Cancer diagnosis recurrence Diagnosis schizophrenia Use antipsychotic medication Diagnosis bipolar disorder without use mood stabilize medication
